title: bet2
description: Automated brain extraction tool for FSL

fractional_intensity.title: Fractional intensity threshold
fractional_intensity.description: Fractional intensity threshold (0->1); default=0.5; smaller values give larger brain outline estimates

vertical_gradient.title: Vertical gradient fractional intensity threshold
vertical_gradient.description: Vertical gradient in fractional intensity threshold (-1->1); default=0; positive values give larger brain outline at bottom, smaller at top

center_of_gravity.title: Center of gravity vector
center_of_gravity.description: The xyz coordinates of the center of gravity (voxels, not mm) of initial mesh surface. Must have exactly three numerical entries in the list (3-vector).

outline_flag.title: Outline flag
outline_flag.description: Generate brain surface outline overlaid onto original image

no_output_flag.title: No output flag
no_output_flag.description: Don't generate segmented brain image output

mesh_flag.title: Mesh flag
mesh_flag.description: Generate brain surface as mesh in vtk format

head_radius.title: Head radius
head_radius.description: Head radius (mm not voxels); initial surface sphere is set to half of this

smooth_factor.title: Smoothness factor
smooth_factor.description: Smoothness factor; default=1; values smaller than 1 produce more detailed brain surface, values larger than one produce smoother, less detailed surface

threshold_flag.title: Threshold flag
threshold_flag.description: Apply thresholding to segmented brain image and mask
